alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Calcasieu Parish through 700 PM CDT... At 629 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Carlyss, or near Sulphur, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail has been reported. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sulphur, Westlake and Carlyss. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 15 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
